sentences.sContent: In terms of valuation, the run of strong earnings combined with declining stock prices translate into some attractively priced stocks.
sentences.sContent_eng: In terms of valuation, the run of strong earnings combined with declining stock prices translate into some attractively priced stocks.
sentences.sCn: 在估值方面，强劲的盈利走势加上下跌的股价，其结果就是价格具有吸引力的股票。

synos.tran: 迷人地；有吸引力地；动人地

words.tran: 吸引人的；有魅力的；引人注目的
吸引，吸引力；引力；吸引人的事物
[自] 吸引子；引起注意的人
